com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.pen

Class SpenPenManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.pen.SpenPenManager

  • public class SpenPenManager
extends Object
    This class provides methods for managing Pen.
    Since:
    3.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SpenPenManager.InstallListener
      This listener interface provides callback methods for receiving Pen plug-in installation and uninstallation events.

      • getPrivateKeyHint

        public String getPrivateKeyHint(SpenPenInfo info)
                         throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                InstantiationException,
                                IllegalAccessException
        Get a private key hint for the specified Pen.
        Parameters:
        info - The Pen plug-in information object.
        Returns:
        String
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - Thrown if the class loader cannot find the specified Pen class.
        IllegalAccessException - Thrown if the Pen class methods are not accessible.
        InstantiationException - Thrown if Pen plug-in instantiation failed.
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if info is null.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • destroyPen

        public void destroyPen(SpenPen pen)
        Unload the specified Pen plug-in instance.
        Parameters:
        pen - The Pen plug-in instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if pen is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if pen manager is closed.
